00038 bool Options::SetPscpApp(wxString path_and_prog) {
00039     if(wxFileName::FileExists(path_and_prog)) {
00040         m_pscpProg = path_and_prog;
00041         // Could even check to make sure it's the right version (I'm dreaming)
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044     //else
00045         wxLogDebug("\"" + path_and_prog + "\" is an invalid PSCP.");
00046         return false;
00047 }

00061 bool Options::SetMingwPath(wxString path) {
00062     if(wxFileName::DirExists(path)) {
00063         m_mingwPath = path;
00064         return true;
00065     }
00066     //else

00068         return false;
